activities:
1. Due Diligence Online, LLC receives information such as name, title, email address, physical address and telephone number from users of our services and individuals contacting us through our public website. Due Diligence Online, LLC may use this information for purposes such as contacting individuals regarding their company's use of the Service, customer support, employment opportunities and to inform users of updates, modifications and other matters relating to the service. 
2. Due Diligence Online, LLC’s service provides clients (including those located within the European Union) with a central location where they can post information and make it accessible to any party they authorize. We do not undertake to know, and clients have no obligation to inform us, whether the information contained in a data room includes personal data. We are not responsible for the content of the information posted in a data room nor do we decide who has access to such information. We perform limited processing of information for our clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Due Diligence Online, LLC will cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) Panel and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner for resolution of any disputes.
